body:
Comment 6 by **francois.genolini**: 
I have tried several possible syntax and all are counter-intuitive to me and are
difficult to reconcile with the help.
For example:

go clean -x -i x/y/z
cd full_path\src\x\y\z
rm -f z z.exe z.test z.test.exe main main.exe

This is probably working as intended, but not documented so that it can be understood. 
Luckily the -x option showed me that the -i feature is of no use to me, and I changed
the Makefile so that bin/* and pkg/* are removed.
